commentList.content: 比較糟糕的入住體驗。之前在歡閣酒店入住多次，還是比較靠譜的。這次床邊的窗台上滿滿灰塵，隨便被子 手蹭到都是髒得不行。擦灰是最容易的表面工作，很難想象更多看不見的衛生是什麼狀況。申請了延時，前台同意了，說是處理了。但是門卡因為時限失靈了幾次，反覆重置。睡到一半又被電話催走人。。。對了，窗台上放手機的鐵架也壞了，垂下來，翻身時磕到
commentList.translatedContent: Relatively bad check-in experience. I have stayed at Huange Hotel many times before, which is quite reliable. I applied for a delay, the front desk agreed and said it was processed. However, the door card failed several times due to the time limit and was repeatedly reset. Halfway through sleep, he was urged to leave by phone. . . By the way, the iron frame of the mobile phone on the window sill is also broken. It hangs down and knocks when it turns over.

個別前台人員，對於服務上缺少嚴謹細節，問的是點播的節目是不要收費，結果回答的是，有收費和免費的節目，讓注意看下，這不是等於沒有解答明白一樣，晚上9.12給前台打電話，一個人也沒有接～
commentList.translatedContent:
The location is not bad, it’s quite close to the Phoenix Hui, the room has basic equipment, no hangers (there is no Chinese prompt on the front of the bottle for shampoo, bath and conditioner). You can only follow the instructions on the back of the bottle. Judging, the toothbrush needs to be taken by yourself, and the toothbrush is divided into soft and hard bristles.
I have to say that the breakfast is quite rich, Chinese and Western buffets are combined, I still hope that the breakfast butter can be replaced with low-salt! !

commentList.content: 定了三晚酒店！第二天酒店前台就打電話問我是否續訂！當時還在睡覺！就很惱火！酒店管理最基本的酒店服務你前台不會把客人信息打進去電腦查看一下 確定一下嗎？ 費得早上打給客人吵醒我！ 這也就算了！酒店不能吸煙 我去樓下吸煙！ 然後發現房卡他們衹給我做了一天！第一天入住的時候就已經告訴前台我定了三個晚上！ 做房卡的時候我跟前台說直接把我房卡做到我酒店預定結束那天！前台叫丹丹的還是個經理！她自己說的....給我的理由是先生您是分開定的酒店一晚一晚單獨定的！所以衹能一天一天給你做房卡！！！請問這是什麼理由？ 我住過那麼多酒店！沒有一個酒店這樣的 我都是分開一晚一晚定！ 我說我昨天入住的時候已經跟你你們說了我定了三個晚上 為什麼今天還來打電話吵我睡覺！我本身就有神經衰弱！特別怕酒店那種叫早電話！被吵醒就再睡不着了！我當時在前台質問這個丹丹經理的時候她一點歉意沒有...還跟我說由於你的房間不是連續定三晚 是一晚一晚定的 我們沒有辦法幫你做之後連續兩天的房卡！這個理由絕了！我本身就是學酒店管理的！您的這個理由真的很好👍！特別好！特別能說服客人！客人聽了一點火都沒有！
commentList.translatedContent: Booked a hotel for three nights! The hotel front desk called me the next day and asked if I would renew! Was still sleeping! Very annoyed! That's all! The hotel cannot smoke. I went downstairs to smoke! Then they found the room card and they only did it for me for one day! When I checked in on the first day, I told the front desk that I had booked three nights! When I made the room card, I told the front desk to directly apply my room card to the day that my hotel reservation ends! Dandan at the front desk is still a manager! She said it herself.... The reason given to me is that you, sir, booked the hotel separately one night and one night! So I can only give you a room card day by day! ! ! What is the reason for this? I have stayed in so many hotels! There is no hotel like this. I always book one night after another! I said that when I checked in yesterday, I told you that I had booked for three nights. Why did you call me today to make me sleep! I have a nervous breakdown! Especially afraid of the hotel's early call! I can't fall asleep after being woken up! When I questioned the manager Dandan at the front desk, she did not apologize at all... and told me that because your room was not booked for three consecutive nights, it was booked one night and one night, and we could not help you to make room for two consecutive days. card! This reason is absolutely perfect! I am learning hotel management! Your reason is really good 👍! Very good! Especially able to convince customers! The guests didn't even have a fire!

commentList.content: 本人吐槽一下入住的真實感受，絕無虛假！十一帶娃去北京旅遊，去之前預訂的該酒店的家庭房，下單之前看到評價有說房間有裝修味道，所以特意致電酒店詢問有沒有空氣凈化器，被告知有后才下單。十月一日抵達酒店后，先去前台辦理入住並繳納房費，交錢之前再次和前台確認是否有空氣凈化器，再次被告知有！好的，交錢，入住！走進電梯我就聞到一股刺鼻的裝修味道，走廊裏房間裏更大，大的都超乎想象！於是馬上詢問空氣凈化器的事，房掃大姐居然拿來一瓶空氣清新劑來噴，說他們酒店根本沒有空氣凈化器！我和前台確認后，告訴我的確沒有空氣凈化器！！！好，我被欺騙了。第一宿，下半夜三點被嗆醒，喉嚨痛頭疼，一夜未眠。孩子第二天一直喊嗓子疼頭疼，老公也說不舒服。上網查是甲醛超標的癥狀之一！一號入住，孩子於三號白天和五號晚上不明原因的流了兩次鼻血，孩子以前是從來不流鼻血的。作為媽媽我現在很擔憂，擔心連住四天甲醛嚴重超標的房間對孩子的健康影響很大。當時隔壁房間的人也說房間有味道！我現在非常不理解酒店裝修甲醛超標為何還有人入住，你們酒店的機器人送餐和免費夜宵都彌補不了甲醛超標這一個致命的缺陷！另外我還沒入住就發現酒店降價了，居然比入住時降了一百！太不靠譜了！我奉勸消費者，為了你的身體健康請你擦亮眼睛，一定要參考評價再下單。不要像我一樣被他家的一些花裏胡哨的裝飾吸引，結果住着甲醛嚴重超標的房間，最終害了自己的孩子！一定要參考評價再下單！
commentList.translatedContent: I would complain about the real feelings of staying in, there is no falsehood! I took my baby to Beijing for a trip to Beijing. I went to the family room of the hotel that I had booked before. I saw that the room was decorated before placing the order, so I specifically called the hotel to ask if there is an air purifier. I only placed the order after I was told. After arriving at the hotel on October 1st, first go to the front desk to check in and pay the room fee. Before paying the money, check with the front desk again if there is an air purifier. I was told again that there is an air purifier! Okay, pay the money and move in! When I walked into the elevator, I smelled a pungent smell of decoration. The rooms in the corridor are bigger and bigger than expected! So I immediately asked about the air purifier, the house sweeper actually took a bottle of air freshener to spray, saying that their hotel does not have an air purifier! After I checked with the front desk, I told me that there was indeed no air purifier! ! ! Well, I was deceived. On the first night, I was awake at three in the middle of the night, with a sore throat and headache, and stayed up all night. The child kept shouting that his throat had a sore headache the next day, and his husband said that he was unwell. Online checking is one of the symptoms of excessive formaldehyde! When I checked in on the 1st, the child had two unexplained nosebleeds during the day on the 3rd and the night on the 5th. The child had never had a nosebleed before. As a mother, I am very worried now. I am worried that staying in a room with severely excessive formaldehyde for four days will have a great impact on the health of the child. The people in the next room also said the room smelled! I don’t understand why people stay in the hotel if the formaldehyde exceeds the standard. The robot delivery and free supper in your hotel can’t make up for the fatal flaw of excessive formaldehyde! In addition, I discovered that the hotel had reduced the price before I checked in. It was a hundred lower than when I checked in! Too unreliable! I advise consumers, please keep your eyes open for your health, and be sure to refer to the evaluation before placing an order. Don't be attracted by some of his house's fancy decorations like me, and ended up living in a room with a serious excess of formaldehyde, which eventually harmed your children! Be sure to refer to the evaluation before placing an order!

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，CitiGO是一個區別與別的傳統酒店設計風格的酒店，我們也理解您以往住習慣了傳統酒店的所謂大麪積房間。針對您的點評內容，希望您能是理性點評，酒店從未表示有空氣凈化器提供，對於您的特殊需求，酒店在您第一天入住當晚在網上訂購空氣凈化器，第二天您就拿到房間了，訂單截屏及放到您房間的監控酒店隨時可以跟您證實這個事情，甲醛問題，酒店已經開業一年多了，假期入住很多小朋友，沒有任何其他家長反饋甲醛問題，是否超標我們也經得起專業工具的測試，如果您認為您孩子留鼻血是因為在酒店入住的原因，您可以到醫院進行身體檢查，任何證明可以證實是在酒店入住的原因造成這個事情，酒店會負責到底；關於差價的問題，您入住的家庭房，預訂的大床房，酒店未收取任何差價給您免費換了高價房型，攜程還向酒店為您爭取免費早餐，也未收取任何費用，我們理解作為父母愛子心切的心情，但作為酒店方，您入住期間我們也盡全力無償提供入住標準以外的更多增值服務，不祈求您會有所領情或平等對待事實，但也希望您不要顛倒事實點評，酒店是不認同的。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests, CitiGO is a hotel with a design style that is different from other traditional hotels. We also understand that you are used to the so-called large rooms of traditional hotels in the past. Regarding your review content, I hope you can comment rationally. The hotel has never stated that it provides air purifiers. For your special needs, the hotel orders air purifiers online on the night of your stay on the first day. Get the room, take screenshots of the order and put it in your room for monitoring. The hotel can confirm this matter with you at any time. The formaldehyde problem, the hotel has been open for more than a year, and many children have stayed in the holiday. No other parents have feedback on the formaldehyde problem, whether it exceeds the standard It can also stand the test of professional tools. If you think that your child's nosebleeds are due to the reason of staying in the hotel, you can go to the hospital for a physical examination. Any proof that can prove that the reason for staying in the hotel caused this matter, the hotel will be responsible to the end. ; Regarding the issue of price difference, the hotel did not charge any price difference for the family room you stayed in, and the big bed room you booked to change the high-priced room type for free. Ctrip also asked the hotel for free breakfast for you, and did not charge any fees. We understand that as a Parents love their children with great enthusiasm, but as the hotel, we will do our best to provide more value-added services beyond the standard of stay during your stay. We do not expect you to appreciate or treat the facts equally, but we also hope that you will not reverse the facts and comments. The hotel does not agree.

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
